notes.title: New update
notes.text:
- Added a button to TaskBar - "Travel to hideout".
- Added a button to History - "Clear History".
- Added a button to History - "Restore notification panel".
- Added a checkbox option - "Close Notification panel on Kick".
- Added checkboxes for allowing Response buttons to close notification panel on click. See settings.
- Increased character limit on "Label" text field: You can now have longer shortcut names.
- Fixed a bug with response buttons not being properly removed.
